meta.title: Race Attack Truck | Premium Vehicle Transport & Motorsport Logistics
meta.description: Our Race Attack Truck offers 70m³ loading volume for up to three vehicles plus equipment. Ideal for racing events, classic and sports car transport in Switzerland and Europe.

hero.title: Race Attack
hero.subtitle: Premium vehicle transport and professional motorsport logistics for demanding customers in Switzerland and throughout Europe.

mainSection.title: Professional
mainSection.description: Our Race Attack Truck is the perfect solution for demanding vehicle transports and motorsport logistics. With a Renault Magnum tractor unit and a specially manufactured Achleitner trailer, we offer you maximum flexibility and safety for your valuable vehicles.
features: Capacity for up to three vehicles plus equipment
2.5 ton lifting platform for safe loading and unloading
Comfortable lounge with kitchen and 2 beds in the front section
Equipped with electrical outlets and compressed air installation
